scripts.start:prod: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail "cd webclient && yarn build"  "cd orm-typed && yarn build && cd ../server && yarn start:prod"
scripts.start:dev: concurrently --kill-others "cd webclient && yarn start" "cd orm-typed && yarn build && cd ../server && yarn start:dev"
scripts.test: cd orm-typed && yarn test && cd ../server && yarn test && cd ../webclient && yarn test
